# Jabal al-Fawwar

| coordinates_ref =
| topo =

| easiest_route =
}}
Jabal al-Fawwar is a mountain in Hama Governorate in Syria. It has an elevation of 1,174 meters, it ranks as the third highest mountain in Hama and the 203rd highest in Syria.
